text:
#YUTA will be on the cover of NUMERO TOKYO on Feb. 26th which will contain a 16 page interview and fashion story. Please look forward to it!

PREORDER:
 https://t.co/7FkBsA3SRu

8. I saw someone said "Night at the Museum" ride is boring, and I have to disagree. This ride is the same concept as Tokyo DisneySea’s Toy Story ride and it is DisneySea’s most popular ride. A 2-player ride. It will probably be boring if you are going alone.
Movie idea: Breathless by Jean-Luc Godard with a little bit of Tokyo Story with a stronger beginning
